title: Interactive Cardano Ecosystem Map
description: Information about Cardano, how to use it, and the project/tools built on it, is fragmented, unorganized and often delivered with bias.
solution: An easily navigable map filled with unbiased, informative content on the projects and tools users can use to interact with Cardano.
experience: A team of four with decades of experience in UI engineering, content creation, market intelligence, marketing and business management.
